name: Multi-Active Day Moisturizer for Lines, Pores, Glow with Niacinamide
about: What it is:A daily moisturizer that targets the first visible signs of aging to smooth the look of lines, refine the appearance of pores, and support a strong moisture barrier—for a healthy-looking glow..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Dullness.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Niacinamide 2%: Visibly smooths fine lines and refines skin’s texture..Ingredient Callouts:This product comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Daily stress and a fast-paced lifestyle are known to have negative impacts on skin, accelerating the aging process. This phenomenon is known as stress aging.* Powered by two percent niacinamide and organic sea holly bio-extract** to fight the eight damaging effects of stress aging, this day cream delivers up to 24 hours of hydration with a melting, energizing texture..Clinical Results:In a self-evaluation with 104 women, after 28 days, results revealed:
ingredients: -2% Niacinamide: Visibly smooths fine lines and refines texture. .-Sea Holly Bio-Extract: Reinforces the skin’s moisture barrier. .-Strawberry Tree Fruit Extract: Visibly refines texture and tightens pores. ..Aqua/Water/Eau, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Glycerin, Betaine, Cetearyl Alcohol, Niacinamide, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Cetearyl Glucoside, Propylene Glycol, Parfum/Fragrance, Caprylyl Glycol, Dipsacus Sylvestris Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Mica, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Polysilicone-11, Chlorphenesin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butylene Glycol, Disodium Edta, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Eryngium Maritimum Extract, Marrubium Vulgare Extract, Phenethyl Alcohol, Decyl Glucoside, Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract, Sodium Citrate, Arbutus Unedo Fruit Extract, Lapsana Communis Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Maris Sal/Sea Salt/Sel Marin, Ci 17200/Red 33.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Smooth over a clean face each morning..-Apply with gentle press-and-release movements, avoiding the eye-contour area..-Work downward, covering the neck and décolleté.

reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this cream for so many reasons. It keeps my skin beautifully moisturized all day long and leaves it with a radiant, glowy finish. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Multi-Active Night Cream from Clarins, and it has become a staple in my nighttime skincare routine. The first thing that caught my attention was the luxurious feel of the cream. The texture is rich and velvety, gliding effortlessly onto the skin.  What sets this night cream apart is its ability to address multiple skincare concerns simultaneously. I noticed a visible reduction in fine lines and wrinkles, giving my skin a smoother and more youthful appearance. The formula is also hydrating without feeling heavy, leaving my skin feeling plump and nourished.  I particularly appreciate the subtle but soothing fragrance, creating a calming atmosphere as I wind down for the night. The jar packaging is not only aesthetically pleasing but also practical, making it easy to control the amount of product dispensed.  After consistent use, I woke up to a revitalized complexion. My skin looked brighter, and the overall texture had improved. The inclusion of anti-aging ingredients like organic Teasel extract adds to the cream's efficacy, promoting skin renewal and resilience.  While the Multi-Active Night Cream is an investment, I believe it's worth every penny for those seeking a comprehensive solution to address aging concerns. Clarins has once again delivered a high-quality product that lives up to its promises, making it a must-have in my nightly skincare ritual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm thrilled to share with you that I've found an incredible product that's been a game-changer for my skin! As I've started to notice some fine lines appearing, this amazing product has been working its magic by targeting the first signs of aging. It visibly smooths lines, refines pores, improves skin texture, and even helps to strengthen the skin's moisture barrier. I'm already seeing a radiant, youthful glow that makes me feel absolutely amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I was really pleasantly surprised to find that this was rich enough to support my skin in the dry winter weather we experience here, given its lighter texture. But it applies beautifully and helps create a great base for makeup. Because it melts into the skin rather than sitting on top I didn’t have any pilling with my foundation, which is always a concern. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A super moisturizing cream that layers well under my sunscreen during the day. Doesn’t cause any excess oil sebum and not too thick for my makeup application. Pores look smaller and skin looks smoother

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing on my skin. It’s a little thick, which I love specially for having dry skin, but it gets abserved immediately It has a light floral scent that doesn’t bother me at all., i actually enjoy it because it feels and smells luxurious. It feels amazing on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is actually a good day cream. I honestly expected it to be thicker but I’m glad it has a more lighter weight consistency. It does a really good job at absorbing nicely into the skin. I also enjoy the afterglow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect daytime moisturizer. Has a very whipped texture and is quite moisturizing but isn’t so thick that it won’t go well underneath your makeup. It does have a slight scent but it’s very enjoyable.
